def main():
    n = int(input())
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a = []
    for i in range(n-1):
        if b[i] <= b[i+1]:
            a.append(b[i])
        else:
            a.append(b[i+1])
    a.append(b[n-2])
    print(sum(a))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
